argc	,	V_1
""	,	L_6
"static unsigned char %s [] %s =\n{\n"	,	L_4
c	,	V_5
"/* automatically generated by bin2hex */\n"	,	L_3
"};\nstatic int %sLen =  %d;\n"	,	L_9
i	,	V_4
stderr	,	V_7
argv	,	V_2
varname	,	V_3
"-i"	,	L_1
"bin2hex: [-i] firmware\n"	,	L_2
"0x%02lx,"	,	L_8
id	,	V_6
EOF	,	V_8
"\n"	,	L_7
"__initdata"	,	L_5
